title: Bug 115960 - Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: When inserting a text item, data item, and dynamic text item, the datetime values retrieved from a table should be displayed in the same format across all three items.
EB: After inputting 'new Date()' as the content for all three items, saving, and previewing, the expected result is that all three items should show the datetime values in the same format. However, the actual result is that the data and text items display the datetime values in the same format, while the dynamic text item shows them in a different format.
SR:
To replicate this issue, follow these steps:

1. Insert a text item, data item, and dynamic text item.
2. Input 'new Date()' as the content for all three items.
3. Save and preview the form.

The dynamic text item should display the datetime values in the same format as the data and text items.
